2.Question: How is Profit Shared when I make Referrals?

Answers.1: It is quite straighforward. Simply tell your family, friends, and audience to use your KMN username as their referrer.
Answers.2: We charge 10% of the payment each passenger makes for a trip. You will be getting half of the 10% we charge. This means if a driver pays N1000, we charge N100, and we give you N50. You earn the same amount as we.

2.Question: How do I Verify my account?

Answers.1: First, enter your email address in the sign up page, you will receive an email containing a One Time Password (OTP). Enter the one time password accordingly, then proceed to provide the additional details by updating your profile.
Answers.2: After you signed up, an OTP would have been sent to the email address you provided. Kindly use the six digits to verify your account.

Answers.1: Enter your user name and password.
